languages.text: {n}Дрожащей рукой вы тянетесь к осколку, скользкому от вашей крови. Отерев металлическую поверхность, вы прячете свое сокровище под одежду — ближе к сердцу и душе, опаленной величием варпа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Дрожащей рукой вы тянетесь к осколку, скользскому от вашей крови. Отерев металлическую поверхность, вы прячете свое сокровище под одежду — ближе к сердцу и душе, опаленной величием варпа.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard, now slippery with your blood. You wipe its metallic surface and stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the great power of the warp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дрожащей рукой вы тянетесь к осколку, скользкому от вашей крови. Отерев металлическую поверхность, вы прячете свое сокровище под одежду — ближе к сердцу и душе, опаленной величием варпа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach your shaking hand to the shard, slippery in your blood. Having cleaned its metallic surface, you hide your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and your soul seared by the majesty of the warp.{/n}

{n}You reach your shaking hand to the shard, slippery in your blood. Having cleaned its metallic surface, you hide your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and your soul seared by the majesty of the warp.{/n}

{n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard now slippery with your blood. Having cleaned its metallic surface, you stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the power of the warp.{/n}

{n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard now slippery with your blood. Having cleaned its metallic surface, you stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the power of the warp.{/n}

{n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard, now slippery with your blood. You wipe its metallic surface and stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the great power of the warp.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你伸出颤抖的手，抚摸着沾满鲜血的碎片。擦净金属表面后，你把这枚碎片藏在衣服下面，紧紧贴着被亚空间的伟力烙下烙印的心智与灵魂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard, now slippery with your blood. You wipe its metallic surface and stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the great power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你伸出颤抖的手，抚摸着沾满鲜血的碎片。擦净金属表面后，你把这枚碎片藏在衣服下面，紧紧贴着被亚空间的伟力烙下烙印的心智与灵魂。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tendez une main tremblante vers le fragment ensanglanté. Après avoir nettoyé sa surface métallique, vous dissimulez votre trésor dans un pli de votre vêtement, tout près de votre cœur et de votre âme marquée à jamais par la puissance du Warp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard, now slippery with your blood. You wipe its metallic surface and stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the great power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tendez une main tremblante vers le fragment ensanglanté. Après avoir nettoyé sa surface métallique, vous dissimulez votre trésor dans un pli de votre vêtement, tout près de votre cœur et de votre âme marquée à jamais par la puissance du Warp.{/n}

languages.text: {n}震える手を、自分の血に塗れてぬめる破片に手を伸ばす。あなたは金属的な表面を拭い、宝物を衣服の中にしまい込んだ。歪みの偉大な力により永遠に焼かれ続ける心臓と魂のすぐそばに。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard, now slippery with your blood. You wipe its metallic surface and stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the great power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}震える手を、自分の血に塗れてぬめる破片に手を伸ばす。あなたは金属的な表面を拭い、宝物を衣服の中にしまい込んだ。歪みの偉大な力により永遠に焼かれ続ける心臓と魂のすぐそばに。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con una mano temblorosa, recoges el fragmento, resbaladizo por tu sangre. Limpias la superficie del metal y guardas el tesoro entre la ropa, junto a tu corazón y tu alma, marcados para siempre por el tremendo poder de la disformidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard, now slippery with your blood. You wipe its metallic surface and stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the great power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una mano temblorosa, recoges el fragmento, resbaladizo por tu sangre. Limpias la superficie del metal y guardas el tesoro entre la ropa, junto a tu corazón y tu alma, marcados para siempre por el tremendo poder de la disformidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du greifst zitternd nach dem Splitter, der nun feucht von deinem Blut ist. Du wischst über die metallische Oberfläche und verbirgst deinen Schatz unter deinen Kleidern, dicht an deinem Herzen und deiner Seele, die für immer von der Macht des Warps versengt sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard, now slippery with your blood. You wipe its metallic surface and stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the great power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du greifst zitternd nach dem Splitter, der nun feucht von deinem Blut ist. Du wischst über die metallische Oberfläche und verbirgst deinen Schatz unter deinen Kleidern, dicht an deinem Herzen und deiner Seele, die für immer von der Macht des Warps versengt sind.{/n}

{n}Du greifst mit zittriger Hand nach dem Splitter, der nun glitschig von deinem Blut ist. Nachdem du die metallische Oberfläche gesäubert hast, versteckst du deinen Schatz unter deinen Kleidern, neben deinem Herz und deiner Seele, die für immer von der Macht des Warps versengt sind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Titremekte olan elini, kanının kayganlaştırdığı parçaya uzatıyorsun. Metalik yüzeyini siliyor ve bu hazineyi kıyafetinin içine sokuyor, öteboyuttaki en büyük gücün ebediyen dağladığı kalbinle ruhunun yanına saklıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach your shaking hand out to the shard, now slippery with your blood. You wipe its metallic surface and stash your treasure under your clothes, next to your heart and soul forever seared by the great power of the warp.{/n}
